metadata.feature_description: Displays all page templates in a hierarchical list view with thumbnails, status indicators, and action buttons

steps.expected: Page Templates page should load showing all templates
steps.actual: Page Templates page loaded successfully showing 8 templates in a grid layout

steps.expected: All templates should be visible in the list
steps.actual: 8 templates displayed: Cavalier - Main, Test Template Page, Workflow Test Template, Test @#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",.<>?/~` Special!, Test Settings Template, Test Page Type Template, Permissions Test Template, Test Template Creation

steps.expected: Each template should have a thumbnail preview image
steps.actual: All 8 templates display thumbnail images showing page preview

steps.expected: Large thumbnail preview should appear on hover
steps.actual: Large tooltip preview appeared showing full page layout with header, navigation, content area, and footer

steps.expected: Status indicators should be present for Hidden/Disabled states
steps.actual: Status elements exist in DOM with CSS classes ('status visible', 'status'). Cavalier - Main has 'visible' status. None of the current templates have Hidden or Disabled status, but the infrastructure exists.

steps.action: Look for publish date in template list
steps.expected: Publish date should be displayed for each template
steps.actual: No publish date is displayed in the current template list UI. DOM analysis confirmed hasDate: false for all templates.

issues: Publish date is not visible in the template list view - feature may not be implemented in the current UI or may require additional configuration

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify child count displays for templates with children

steps.action: Check for child count in template list
steps.expected: Templates with children should show child count
steps.actual: Child count elements exist in DOM. All current templates show childCount: 0 (no children). The infrastructure to display child count is present but all existing templates are leaf nodes.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test empty state when no templates exist

steps.action: Search for non-existent template to simulate empty state
steps.expected: Empty state message or indication should appear
steps.actual: When searching for 'NonExistentTemplateXYZ123', the list shows empty white space with no templates displayed. No 'No results found' message is shown.

issues: Empty state does not show a helpful message like 'No templates found' - UX improvement opportunity

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test special characters in template names

steps.action: Verify template with special characters displays correctly
steps.expected: Template with special characters should render properly without XSS
steps.actual: Template 'Test @#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",.<>?/~` Special!' displays correctly. Special characters are properly escaped and rendered safely.
Hover preview shows content with XSS payloads properly sanitized (displayed as HTML entities)

steps.action: Hover over template to reveal action buttons
steps.expected: Edit and Delete buttons should appear
steps.actual: Edit button appears on hover. Delete button also visible for non-default templates. The first template (Cavalier - Main) shows Edit only (appears to be default template).

steps.expected: Layout should adapt to smaller viewport
steps.actual: Grid maintains 3 columns but third column is partially cut off. PersonaBar collapses to icons only. Add Template button not visible. Template names remain readable.

issues: At 768px width, third column content is partially cut off - could benefit from responsive grid adjustment

steps.expected: Layout should adapt to mobile viewport
steps.actual: Grid shows 2 columns. Second column is cut off on the right. Template cards functional but cramped. PersonaBar remains visible with collapsed icons.

issues: At 480px mobile width, content is cut off rather than reflowing - responsive design needs improvement for mobile admin views

steps.expected: All templates should be accessible via scrolling
steps.actual: 8 templates displayed in 3x3 grid (partially showing row 3). Grid layout accommodates multiple templates with consistent sizing.

observations: Status indicators exist in DOM as CSS classes (visible, hidden, disabled) but are not visually displayed as badges/labels in the current UI
Publish date is not shown in the template list view - the feature description mentions it but it's not visible in the current implementation
Child count infrastructure exists (shows 0 for all templates) but no visual indicator is shown when templates have no children
Search filtering requires pressing Enter to activate - does not filter in real-time as user types
Empty state when search returns no results shows blank area without helpful messaging
The first template (Cavalier - Main) has a blue/cyan border indicating it may be the default template
Hover preview tooltip shows a large detailed preview of template layout - excellent feature for template selection
Responsive design at narrow widths (768px, 480px) causes content to be cut off rather than reflowing - admin panel is optimized for desktop use
